name: h3
description: Introducing the 2025 Marucci Asura Drop 11 Fastpitch Softball Bat, a game-changer engineered for peak performance and optimized feel. Featuring Gap Sync Barrel Technology, this bat boasts the largest progressive gap design in the industry, maximizing inner barrel displacement for unmatched performance across all bat lengths, drops, and weights. The EVolve Composite Technology enhances barrel responsiveness with a progressively increasing fiber angle, tailoring the bat for athletes of all ages and swing speeds. The PFX Composite Handle adjusts flex characteristics by weight drop, boosting swing speed, power, and feel, while the patented OLS Connection offers the stiffest connection available, eliminating vibrations for a smooth swing. Completing this powerhouse, the TFX Endcap and updated knob design provide increased forgiveness and improved comfort, ensuring control and effortless power with every hit. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
features: Delivery: FAST & FREE Shipping on ALL Orders
Certification: USSSA 1.20, ISA, WBSC, NSA, & USA Softball (ASA)
Gap Sync Barrel Tech: Increases performance & optimizes feel
Mid-Loaded Barrel: Effortless power without sacrificing swing speed
EVolve Composite: Maximizes performance & barrel responsiveness
PFX Composite Handle: Enhances swing speed, power & feel
Outer-Locking System (OLS): Reduces vibration on contact and enhances stiffness
TFX End Cap: Softer end cap for more barrel flex for increased forgiveness
Enhanced Soft-Touch Grip: For a comfortable swing & extra control
